title: SPECIAL PREVIEW: Straight Outta Vegas with RJ Bell – Kershaw Dilemma and NFL Week 6 Preview
itunes:title: SPECIAL PREVIEW: Straight Outta Vegas with RJ Bell – Kershaw Dilemma and NFL Week 6 Preview
description:
Subscribe directly to Straight Outta Vegas with RJ Bell right here.

Today on Straight Outta Vegas, RJ Bell and the crew believe Dave Roberts should have pulled Clayton Kershaw sooner in game 4 of the NLCS. Fezzik's Best Bet of the week is the 49ers +3 vs the Rams and the guys preview every game this Sunday in the NFL including their crossfire game of the week between the Bucs and Packers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
